attributes.action: Abolish any plans to pay smokers £12.50 per week to quit smoking.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Plans are underway in Scotland to pay smokers to give up smoking, a further roll out of the idea is planned for other parts of the UK. Participants in the new initiative will be offered £12.50 per week credited onto an electronic card which they can redeem in their local supermarket for fresh food and groceries. I feel this is a waste of public money which could be put to better use.
